description: Create folder structure to place individual epic, feature, and story documents in the correct location
goal: Arrange stories for optimal delivery sequence within each increment
inputs: story-graph.json (with increments), technical dependencies, team capacity
outputs: story-graph.json (with story order), arranged story map visualizations
instructions: Perform each instruction action as specified in base_actions, tweaked for the arrange behavior.
1. Initialize Project - Follow agile_bot/bots/base_bot/base_actions/1_initialize_project/instructions.json, arrange: organizing story artifacts
4. Build Knowledge - Follow agile_bot/bots/base_bot/base_actions/4_build_knowledge/instructions.json, arrange: build structured story organization
5. Render Output - Follow agile_bot/bots/base_bot/base_actions/5_render_output/instructions.json, arrange: render organized folder structure
6. Validate Rules - Follow agile_bot/bots/base_bot/base_actions/7_validate_rules/instructions.json, arrange: validate folder structure rules
7. Correct Bot - Follow agile_bot/bots/base_bot/base_actions/6_correct_bot/instructions.json, arrange: correct organization issues
- **STOP for human feedback** when told to stop or when action requires user input
- **CONTINUE to next action** when told to proceed
- **STOP when complete** when all actions are finished
